title: Ticket #4985: Support input file caching via Squid caching proxy server
description: This ticket implements caching of input files via Squid caching proxy server. The user specifies PublicInputFiles in the submit file for input files that can be cached. Then these files are transferred via web server, and a caching proxy server can be specified so that each unique input file need only be transferred once from the web server. After that, all requests for that file will be automatically served from the caching proxy.
remarks:
